issue.title: [C++] Improve BufferBuilder performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5204](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5204). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
BufferBuilder makes a spurious memset() when extending the buffer size.

We could also tweak the overallocation strategy in Reserve().
